question: In which nation "Laguna de Leche" freshwater lake is located?
explanation: Laguna de Leche is the largest natural freshwater lake in Cuba. It is also known as Milk Lagoon or Laguna Grande de Moron. This lake is very famous for its characteristic white colour which is caused by the lake's limestone bed giving it a milky colour. Chicola Channel was used to connect the lake with Bay of Buena Vista.
